title: When is 7.12 coming out in EU server PLEAS ?
body: When does the PATCH 7.12 come out .. am STILL WAITING THE PATCH FOR all changed + Yasuo SKIN .. Pleas any body know tell me the date

replies.body: I'm excited for some new skins myself, but we don't have any news on upcoming content until it's been announced.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wgw0vAmb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-10T18:39:06.801+0000)
>
> I'm excited for some new skins myself, but we don't have any news on upcoming content until it's been announced.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date!


To go on with the classic system, the patch will be live at Wednesday morning in EUW and the skins will come out with the mission system. So I guess in the week after the patch released (guess Monday, but I am not sure)
Ohhh thanks so much for replay ... i hope too <3333
